content:
Hello,
I remember that last time, I somehow managed to upload my slides to my session in Whova (as a speaker). However I can't seeem to be able to reproduce this...

Please upload it to the Validar Sharepoint, using this naming convention YYMMDD_FIrstLastSpeaker_TitleOfPresentation and we will make sure it gets added to the session in Whova. https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__validar.egnyte.com_ul_Xrl7LN0Hm5&d=DwMFAg&c=jf_iaSHvJObTbx-siA1ZOg&r=ihbr48V5yLm3iIewt3Ei2mtLLy1QdL8CBmidgfu1hhc&m=ORht2YjfK2-CTu-xuKe1TO1Toe6cXmQ9ATX4Wd0K-tk&s=N4pBbcB6nejgLE3g83PVhD4rzqFruPEqolD1wj16Uuc&e=
Done. Thanks! :thumbs_up:
